metadata.title: CVE-2018-19761 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There is an illegal address access at fromsixel.c (function:sixel_decode_raw_impl) in libsixel 1.8.2 that will cause a denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: libsixel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
